adrFormatAddress: 520 8th Ave, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: The instructors are the best. They build you up, push and encourage you while helping you to do your best ! They are all about womanhood and moving with your body anyway you can!! Love it here!!

text.text: The instructors are the best. They build you up, push and encourage you while helping you to do your best ! They are all about womanhood and moving with your body anyway you can!! Love it here!!

originalText.text: Brukwine is so much fun.  The music is great, Instructors are amazing and you definitely break a good sweat by working your core and lower body.  I come out of there feeling like I did leg and ab day. I've taken a few dance workout classes and by far Brukwine is the best.  They break down their moves in a way that's easy to follow. Very positive environment

originalText.text:
Fantastic workout and you learn cute and new dance moves!  The instructors are very knowledgeable and break down each move well!
I highly recommend it for anyone who want to try something new and burn calories!

I highly recommend it for anyone who want to try something new and burn calories!

originalText.text: I have attended many Brukwine class and not only are the instructor's awesome but you definitely feel the burn and work up a good sweat.I love  dancing to dancehall music so being able to workout doing what I love is great! Keep it going ladies!

text.text: I have attended many Brukwine class and not only are the instructor's awesome but you definitely feel the burn and work up a good sweat.I love  dancing to dancehall music so being able to workout doing what I love is great! Keep it going ladies!

originalText.text: On 10/25/18 I purchased the Brukwine Halloween special which was $10.00. I picked the class for Friday, 10/26/18 because the coupon special expired 10/27/18, and I had work on the 27th. When I proceeded to check out there was no indication that I could not use the coupon for the specific class that I picked. I arrived at the class on the 26, I was ready to have fun! The instructor tried to check me in, and then she told me that the coupon was not for her class it was for another class. I explained to her that when I purchased it, there was no notice saying there was a specific class I had to take. She then went outside to call her boss, Tamera. When she came back in she told me that I had to leave. I asked her if I can get a refund on my money since I did not receive any services. She suggested that I email them which I did, and I have yet to hear from them. I had to take matters into my own hands and call my bank. I just want to say I am an unhappy customer, and I hope this does not happen to anyone else. Have a good day everyone!
